keyPolicies.policyDescription: Jonathan and Vince Cable want more support for small businesses to protect local jobs and communities.
Jonathan wants a fair start for all our children with smaller class sizes.
Only the Liberal Democrats want real change to clean up politics and give power back to local people.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour can't win here. Votes cast in South East Cambs, 2009 local election: Con 46%, Lib Dem 42%, Lab 7%

issues.education: Jonathan wants a fair start for all our children with smaller class sizes.
issues.governance: Only the Liberal Democrats want real change to clean up politics and give power back to local people.
issues.health: Jonathan and his young family know the importance of good schools and hospitals.

leaflet.personalStatement: Jonathan lives in Impington, in the heart of the constituency. Jonathan has 20 years experience in business and would be a hard working MP.

images.caption: Jonathan lives in Impington, in the heart of the constituency. Jonathan has 20 years experience in business and would be a hard working MP. Jonathan and his young family know the importance of good schools and hospitals.
It's a clear choice for our next MP. Support Jonathan's campaign.
Jonathan and Vince Cable want more support for small businesses to protect local jobs and communities.
Jonathan wants a fair start for all our children with smaller class sizes.
Only the Liberal Democrats want real change to clean up politics and give power back to local people.
